General.Name: SMS Lifesciences India Limited
General.Description: SMS Lifesciences India Limited manufactures and sells active pharmaceutical ingredients (APIs) and intermediates in India. It offers APIs in various therapeutic areas, such as antiulcer, antifungal, erectile dysfunction, anti-gout, anesthesia, anti-infective, anti-obesity, anti-convulsant, anti-emetic, ophthalmic, anti-worm, and antiemetic. The company also exports its products. SMS Lifesciences India Limited was founded in 1990 and is based in Hyderabad, India.
